mapper.select: SELECT PRESENT.PRESENT_NO PRESENT_NO, PRESENT.PRESENT_PRICE PRESENT_PRICE, PRESENT.PRESENT_NAME PRESENT_NAME, PRESENT.PROJECT_NO PROJECT_NO, PROJECT.DELIVERY_DATE DELIVERY_DATE, PROJECT.PROJECT_NAME FROM PRESENT JOIN PROJECT ON PRESENT.PROJECT_NO = PROJECT.PROJECT_NO WHERE PRESENT.PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo} ORDER BY PRESENT.PRESENT_PRICE

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INVEST JOIN PROJECT ON INVEST.PROJECT_NO = PROJECT.PROJECT_NO
INVEST.USER_ID = #{userId}
AND PROJECT.PROJECT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND INVEST.INVEST_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(INVEST.INVEST_NO,1,8),'rrrr-mm-dd') BETWEEN #{startdate} AND #{enddate}
AND INVEST.PAY_TYPE = '001'
AND INVEST.PAY_TYPE = '002'
AND INVEST.PAY_TYPE = '003'

SELECT INVEST.INVEST_NO AS INVEST_NO, PROJECT.PROJECT_NAME AS PROJECT_NAME, INVEST.INVESTMENT_AMOUNT AS INVENST_AMOUNT, COMMON_CODE.CODE_NAME AS PAY_TYPE, COMMON_CODE2.CODE_NAME AS PAYMENT_STATE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(INVEST.INVEST_NO,1,8),'rrrr-mm-dd') AS INVEST_DATE, INVEST.POSTCODE AS POSTCODE, INVEST.ADDRESS AS ADDRESS, INVEST.ADDR_DETAIL AS ADDR_DETAIL, INVEST.PHONE_NUM AS PHONE_NUM, INVEST.EMAIL AS EMAIL, PRESENT.PRESENT_NAME AS PRESENT_NAME FROM INVEST JOIN PROJECT ON INVEST.PROJECT_NO = PROJECT.PROJECT_NO JOIN COMMON_CODE ON (COMMON_CODE.CODE = INVEST.PAY_TYPE AND COMMON_CODE.CODE_GROUP ='A01') JOIN COMMON_CODE COMMON_CODE2 ON (COMMON_CODE2.CODE = INVEST.PAYMENT_STATE AND COMMON_CODE2.CODE_GROUP ='B02') JOIN PRESENT ON INVEST.PRESENT_NO = PRESENT.PRESENT_NO WHERE INVEST_NO = #{investNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INVEST ( INVEST_NO, INVESTMENT_AMOUNT, PAY_TYPE, PRESENT_NO, USER_ID, PROJECT_NO, PAYMENT_STATE, POSTCODE, ADDRESS, ADDR_DETAIL, PHONE_NUM, EMAIL, NAME, REQUEST, UUID ) VALUES ( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd')||lpad(INVEST_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,4,0), #{investmentAmount}, '001', #{presentNo}, #{userId}, #{projectNo}, '001', #{postcode}, #{address}, #{addrDetail}, #{phoneNum}, #{email}, #{name}, #{request}, #{uuid} )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT INVEST.INVEST_NO INVEST_NO, INVEST.NAME NAME, INVEST.INVESTMENT_AMOUNT INVESTMENT_AMOUNT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(INVEST.INVEST_NO,0,8),'rrrrmmdd'), 'rrrr/mm/dd') INVEST_DATE, PRESENT.PRESENT_NAME PRESENT_NAME, INVEST.POSTCODE POSTCODE, INVEST.ADDRESS||' '||INVEST.ADDR_DETAIL ADDRESS, INVEST.EMAIL EMAIL, INVEST.PHONE_NUM PHONE_NUM, PROJECT.PROJECT_NO PROJECT_NO, PROJECT.PROJECT_NAME PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT.USER_ID USER_ID FROM INVEST JOIN PRESENT ON INVEST.PROJECT_NO = INVEST.PROJECT_NO AND INVEST.PRESENT_NO = PRESENT.PRESENT_NO JOIN COMMON_CODE ON (INVEST.PAYMENT_STATE= COMMON_CODE.CODE AND COMMON_CODE.CODE_GROUP = 'B02') JOIN PROJECT ON(INVEST.PROJECT_NO = PROJECT.PROJECT_NO) JOIN COMMON_CODE COMMON_CODE2 ON (PROJECT.PROGRESS = COMMON_CODE2.CODE AND COMMON_CODE2.CODE_GROUP = 'C03')
COMMON_CODE.CODE = '001' AND COMMON_CODE2.CODE = '002' AND PROJECT.USER_ID = #{userId}
AND PROJECT.PROJECT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND INVEST.INVEST_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND PRESENT.PRESENT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY INVEST_DATE DESC ) A )WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}
